tool_description: Measures electrical conductivity of water to assess total dissolved solids content and overall mineralization, indicating potential contamination or treatment needs.

sample_id.description: Unique identifier of the water sample being tested

measurement_temperature.description: Sample temperature during measurement in Celsius

reference_temperature.description: Reference temperature for conductivity correction in Celsius

error_messages: Temperature out of range: Sample temperature must be between 5°C and 50°C
Electrode contamination: Conductivity probe requires cleaning before measurement
Calibration expired: Instrument calibration has exceeded recommended interval
Air bubbles detected: Remove air bubbles from probe for accurate reading
usage: Provide sample ID and measure sample temperature accurately. Ensure probe is clean and calibrated. Temperature compensation is critical for accurate results.

conductivity_us_cm.description: Electrical conductivity in microsiemens per centimeter

tds_estimate_mg_l.description: Estimated total dissolved solids in mg/L

potential_issues.description: Potential water quality issues indicated by conductivity
